ygData.subject: Re: MM faction (Spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you are safe in the pass, you ll be safe in the keep, except for Princess Lenya and a handful of other out of the way NPC s. ... Why not just do the
ygData.messageBody:
"Wilson, ThomasX B" wrote:
>
> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
> For those that want it you can find a map here
>
> http://www.gameznet.com/eq/maps/Highkeep.jpg
>
> Since I've only run though High Hold Pass, I do have a few questions. Once
> inside the keep itself, will I still be KOS? I'm assuming so, but you never
> know..
>

If you are safe in the pass, you'll be safe in the keep, except for
Princess Lenya and a handful of other out of the way NPC's.

> Also does anybody have any stats off this new armor, I'm really going to be
> hesitant to go after new armor if it's not better than my current stuff (or
> better looking at least, hard to do with the all black and silver look I
> have now).
>

Why not just do the quests for fun and then compare once you get
them =) That's what I plan on doing.

Xilith
